dataObject.content: Bernie Sanders, meanwhile, sees early voting as a way to boost turnout among core constituencies like young, minority and working-class voters. Early voting opens new opportunities for people with strict work schedules or other barriers to voting to find time to cast ballots beyond the typical Election Day, spokeswoman Sarah Ford said.

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"Although there are two people quoted, both quotes are in support of early voting.  The author appears supportive of a particular issue and has so far only provided one side of the issue, which is in favor of early voting.  "}
